name: Plasma_Blast
display_help: The Battle Orb's blast deals minor damage, but will reduce its target's regeneration rate.

name: Shield_Generator
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Shield Generator gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks. The Force Field Generator also protects allies inside from Immobilization, and Disorient effects.

name: Deploy_Stimulant
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally of some Hit Points and frees an ally from any status effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time.

name: Sonic_Augmentation
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Force Field Generator gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Force Field Generator also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.

name: Plasma_Spray
display_help: The Battle Orb's Plasma Spray deals moderate damage in a large cone and reduces targets' regeneration rates.

name: Resuscitator
display_help: The Battle Orb's Resuscitator is capable of reviving an ally with a good amount of health and endurance.

name: Plasmatic_Immobilizer
display_help: The Plasmatic Taser fired by the Battle Orb is capable of immobilizing and damage foes in a large ranged cone in front of it.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Minor DoT(Energy), Foe Immobilize

name: Plasmatic_Stunner
display_help: The Battle Orb is capable of setting its plasma weapons to stun its target for a short time.

name: Chemical_Burn
display_help: The Warwork's plasma weapon is capable of launching a chemical grenade that cripples the recharge rate of the target as well as inflicting tremendous Toxic damage over time.

name: Avoid
display_help: Foes will avoid this area.

name: Level_Shift_Application
display_help: Applies a random +0 through +3 level shift to the owner

display_help: Level Shift +1

name: Plasma_Cannon_Barrage
display_help: The Warworks Defense Turrets are equipped with plasma turrets capable of dealing energy damage. Burns from these blasts reduce a target's regeneration rate for a short time.

name: Rapid_Repair

name: Incarnate_Punch
display_help: The Olympian Guard wields a large portion of the power of Tyrant. These super soldier clones are capable of crushing their foes in close quarters with energy melee attacks.

name: Incarnate_Haymaker
display_help: The Olympian Guard wields a large portion of the power of Tyrant. These super soldier clones are capable of crushing their foes in close quarters with energy melee attacks.

name: Incarnate_Foot_Stomp
display_help: The Olympian Guard wields a large portion of the power of Tyrant. These super soldier clones are capable of crushing their foes in close quarters with energy melee attacks.

name: Incarnate_Knockout_Blow
display_help: The Olympian Guard wields a large portion of the power of Tyrant. These super soldier clones are capable of crushing their foes in close quarters with energy melee attacks.

name: Incarnate_Hand_Clap
display_help: The Olympian Guard wields a large portion of the power of Tyrant. These super soldier clones are capable of crushing their foes in close quarters with energy melee attacks.

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: The Olympian Guard is able to shrug off wounds that would kill a normal person. Dull Pain not only increases their maximum hit points, but it will also heal them for a large portion of their health.

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of half of your Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Eye_Beam
display_help: The Olympian Guard are capable of firing a concentrated beam of energy from their visor. This beam causes high damage and reduces the target's defense.

name: Beam_Sweep
display_help: The Olympian Guard are capable of firing a concentrated beam of energy from their visor. This beam causes high damage and reduces the target's defense.

name: Mighty_Roar
display_help: The

name: Roided
display_help: This IDF soldier has been greatly enhanced and is dramatically more powerful than other IDF troopers.

name: Regeneration
display_help: The Self-Repairing Extinction War Walker can almost instantaneously recover from any damage applied - unless they are being affected by the Devouring Earth lichen.

name: Summon_Battle_Orb
display_help: IDF Lieutenants and Bosses are capable of summoning a Mk 1, 2 or 3 Battle Orb.

name: Missile_Volley
display_help: The Heavy Trooper fires a barrage of micro missiles at its target dealing moderate lethal and fire damage. Targets struck by this attack will also suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked off their feet.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockdown

name: Missile_Barrage
display_help: The Heavy Trooper showers the battlefield with several micro missiles dealing high lethal and fire damage as well as inflicting minor toxic damage over time. Some targets of this attack may be knocked off of their feet.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockdown

name: Nerve_Gas_Rockets
display_help: The Heavy Trooper's rocket packs are armed with micro missiles loaded with nerve gas. These missiles cause minor lethal and fire damage immediately and may hold their targets. Targets struck by this attack will suffer toxic damage over time.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Hold, Moderate DoT(Toxic)

name: EMP_Rockets
display_help: These missiles deal light fire and lethal damage and emit a constant EMP pulse which will drain endurance from their targets as well as reducing their regeneration for a short time.

name: Plasma_Strafe
display_help: The twin plasma machine guns can strafe a wide area in front of the IDF soldier, protecting against close assault.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen

name: Focused_Burst
display_help: The twin plasma machine guns focused on a single target can do significant damage and drive them back.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback

name: All_Out_Assault
display_help: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, and those standing in between getting hit by both, turning the area into a instant killing field.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback - and/or - High DMG(Lethal/Fire), DoT(Toxic), Knockdown

name: Burst

name: All_Out_Assault
display_help: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, the railguns on distant targets, with a little overlap between each system. It is designed to flatten the area, and is quite effective.

name: Stealth
